feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 1:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: WSW 41 km/h gust 60 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
